description:
We have a large cozy 1 BR apartment in Williamsburg. The apartment includes a bedroom with a full bed, one bathroom, a large kitchen, and a cozy living room with a TV, couch, and large air mattress.

If you prefer cooking at home, we have a large kitchen and counter space. Guests are welcome to use all appliances and servingware. There is a grocery store directly across the street.

Guests will have access to the entire apartment with privacy from us. We will not be at the apartment, but accessible via email.

We are conveniently located in Williamsburg. Walking distance to many great restaurants, bars, coffee shops and parks. Close to other Brooklyn neighborhoods Greenpoint, Buschwick and Bed-stuy. Free parking on the street.

Very close access to several trains into Manhattan. 15-minute train ride into the city. Walking distance from Williamsburg bars and restaurants.

TV includes basic cable, Sling, Netflix and HBO
name: Large 1BR Brooklyn Apt
review: Gorgeous, cosy apartment. We felt immediately at home. Nicholas was very responsive to messages and we had no trouble with check in/out, connecting to wifi etc. We'd love to stay here again.
